cab.content: HIS DOCUMENT IS THE PROPERTY OF HIS BRITANNIC MAJESTY1 S GOVERNMENT.ECRET.,.T. 5.979,WAR CABINET. NATIONAL LAY' OF"PRAYER.Copy of talflgram from Governor-General of New 5aland to Secretary of State for the ColoniestThe Geverncr-Gsneral of New Zealand to the' Secretary ff State fer the Colonies(Bated 4th October. Received Colonial Office 6.30 p.m.4th October, 1918.Would be glad to receive intimation as early as possible as to whether first Sunday in the New Year or any ether date is io be observed as a National Day of Prayer.- ' LIVERPOOL.
